item.title: Republicans look to finally push through Laken Riley bill with new GOP trifecta
item.description: Republicans are stepping on the gas and renewing bills Democrats ignored in the last Congress, the first of which being the Laken Riley Act.

item.title: Tuesday's special elections in Virginia could give early insight into governor race, 2026 midterms
item.description: Three special elections Tuesday in Virginia could prove an early bellwether in the 2025 governor's race there as well as the 2026 midterms.
